# BooleanIntFormatter.Serialize method

Serializes a boolean to an equivalent integer

```csharp
public string Serialize(object objValue)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| objValue | Boolean to serialize. |

## Return Value

0 for False, 1 for True.
